content.raw:
I decided to make a copy of `hx_responser.cc` in `test/integration`.  That way, we don't confuse the needs of an example or tool with the needs of a test (there are assumptions in the test about the specific return values from the `hx_responser`).

I did that in 01178a7 on `update_messages_examples`, then merged that branch into here.

Separately, we should consider building the code in `example` by default.  At least on Windows, we want to ship with a working, compiled controller `.exe`.
content.html:
I decided to make a copy of hx_responser.cc in test/integration. That way, we don't confuse the needs of an example or tool with the needs of a test (there are assumptions in the test about the specific return values from the hx_responser).

I did that in 01178a7 on update_messages_examples, then merged that branch into here.

Separately, we should consider building the code in example by default. At least on Windows, we want to ship with a working, compiled controller .exe.
